thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 2 of 630
thread.title: Giulia

author: Giulia
title: Giulia
text: I have never been disappointed with yesstyle. You get exactly what you pay for so when people complain about the quality of cheap items, that's to be expected, honestly. There was this one time I bought from them and never got my package, so I emailed them and they gave me the same amount of money I spent there in credit so I could buy there again for free! Even if it wasn't their mistake, but the mailing company's. That had me as their loyal customer, I buy there everytime I need new skincare products, or cute clothes, cute stationary, everything at a very low price. That plus the fact they hold crazy sales every now and then. PLUS the fact I always spend more than $35 so i always get free shipping. This is my 7th purchase with them and I will keep doing so. I seriously love yesstyle.
